titleStmt.title: A sermon lately preached on I Corinth. 3.15. By a reverend divine of the Church of England
titleStmt.author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: reprinted for Joseph Howes bookseller, at the Kings-Arms in Castle-street,
